participant_1.background:
I'm looking for a new place to live that is close to my favorite fishing spot.
My parents have always been there for me and supported my dreams.
i like chicken nuggets.
i go to at least 10 concerts a year.
My parents were always supportive of my wild ways.

participant_2.background:
I have a pet dog named Sunshine who loves to play in my sunflower field.
i am a huge fan of baseball.
christmas is my favorite holiday.
i was born completely deaf.
I find that my childhood cartoons inspire me to be more creative.

content.text: Hey there! How are you today?
Hello! I am good, how are you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm excited for the weekend. Are you doing anything fun?
I'm not sure yet, I might go to a baseball game. What are you doing?
I'm going to a concert! I'm really excited to see my favorite band.
That sounds like fun! I love concerts. What band is it?
It's a band called The Killers. Have you heard of them?
Yes! I love them! I saw them in concert a few years ago. They were great.
That's awesome! I'm glad you've heard of them. They're one of my favorite bands.
Me too! I'm sure you'll have a great time at their concert.
What other bands do you like?
I like a lot of different bands. I like The Lumineers, Mumford & Sons, and The Head and the Heart.
I love all of those bands! We should go to a concert together sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to go to a concert with you.
Great! We can start planning one soon.
